sentences.sContent: His indefatigable spirit helped him to cope with his illness.
sentences.sCn: 他不屈不挠的精神帮助他对抗病魔。

synos.tran: 不知疲倦的；不屈不挠的；有耐性的

remMethod.val: in(不) + de(表强调) + fatigable(易疲倦的) → 不知疲倦的

trans.tranOther: You use indefatigable to describe someone who never gets tired of doing something
